column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
I got some weird red dots on my arms. I don't know what they are.

That could be a number of things. It's difficult to diagnose without physical examination, but these red dots could possibly be a skin rash or an infection. It's important to get checked out by a doctor, so please make an appointment as soon as possible.
I got a weird thing on the tip of my penis. It's really horrific.

That's concerning. It's important to get an examination as soon as possible to see if this is an infection or something else. In the meantime, refrain from sexual contact and practice safe hygiene habits. Please make an appointment with a doctor as soon as you can.
i have uh a runny nose and i'm throwing up for a few days what could it be

It's difficult to say without a physical examination, but this could be an infection. It's possible that you could have a cold, the flu, or a stomach virus. The best thing to do is to make an appointment with a doctor to get checked out and receive treatment.
